<style>
	   	    body {
	   	    	font-family: Roboto, sans-serif;
	   	    	font-size: 16px;
	   	    	line-spacing: 18px;
	   	    	background-color: #f2f2f2;
	   	    	color: #222;
	   	    }
	   	    h1 {
	   	    	font-size: 20px;
	   	    	font-family: serif;
	   	    	display: block;
	   	    	color: #000;
	   	    	margin-top:10px;
	   	    	font-weight: 700;
	   	    	text-transform: capitalize;
	   	    	margin-bottom: 0px;
	   	    }
	   	    h3 {
	   	    	font-size: 18px;
	   	    	text-transform: capitalize;
	   	    	color: #000;
	   	    	font-weight: 700;
	   	    	font-family: serif;
	   	    }
	   	    .byline {
	   	    	padding-bottom: 5px;
	   	    	border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
	   	    	color: #999;
	   	    	font-size: 12px;
	   	    	line-spacing: 14px;
	   	    	margin-top: 5px;
	   	    }
	   	   	a {
	   	   		text-decoration: none;
	   	   	}
	   	   	.thumb {
	   	   		overflow-y: scroll;
	   	   	}
	   	   	.thumbinner {
	   	   		border: 1px solid #ccc;
	   	   		background-color: #f9f9f9;
	   	   		padding: 3px;
	   	   		margin: 0px auto;
	   	   	}
	   	   	.thumb .magnify {
	   	   		display: none;
	   	   	}
	   	   	.thumb .thumbcaption {
	   	   		text-align: center;
	   	   	}
	   	   	
	   	   	.footer {
	   	   		border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
	   	   		padding-top: 5px;
	   	   		text-align: center;
	   	   		font-size: 14px;
	   	   	}
	   	</style>
